# XmlFormatterBase.CleanWhitespaceNode method

Allows use of a modified version of a whitespace-only node.

```csharp
protected virtual XText CleanWhitespaceNode(XText whitespaceText)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| whitespaceText | A whitespace-only node |

## Return Value

A whitespace-only node, possibly a new one, possibly the same as the input
